review: Been using 2% hydrocortisone ointment for 3 years.  Still have a flare-up from time to time, but this DISEASE is controlled by Cetaphil and Hydrocortisone.  Medics are trying to take the hydrocortisone away from me for a year now.  Go figure
Helped stop the itching and went from red and starting to smell to pink and no smell within 4 applications
